channel.title: Forensics on Flavien Jaquerod
channel.description: Recent content in Forensics on Flavien Jaquerod

item.title: Logger
item.description: This challenge contains a file with USB traffic between many hosts. We can inspect this traffic and use a script to recover the keystrokes which contain the flag.

item.title: TrueSecrets
item.description: this challenge makes us go through a .raw file containing all the content of a windows file system at some point. Checking the processes and applications, we see TrueCrypt file that we can use to retrieve content and break AES encryption to get the flag

item.title: Alien cradle
item.description: A concise walkthrough of the very easy Hack The Box challenge “Alien cradle”.
